segments.text: I notice the boy stretching as far as he can to grab those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, like this is some kind of game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her dishes, she doesn’t even see the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s determination is almost admirable, even if it’s reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it or if the woman will turn around and catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a slow-motion disaster, but I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall—he’s really pushing his luck.
segments.speaker: PAR
